survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Hybrid Vehicle Features Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and priorities when considering hybrid vehicle features to inform product development and marketing strategies.

questions.question_text: Which of the following hybrid vehicle features is most important to you?
questions.client_notes: Use radio buttons for single selection. Randomize answer options to avoid bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following hybrid vehicle features is most important to you?

questions.question_text: Please select all factors that would influence your decision to purchase a hybrid vehicle:
answer_options: Available models in preferred vehicle class
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include 'Other' with open-text option.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes with optional 'Other' text field

script.question_text: Please select all factors that would influence your decision to purchase a hybrid vehicle:
answer_options: Available models in preferred vehicle class

questions.question_text: What is your maximum acceptable price premium for a hybrid version compared to a conventional gasoline vehicle in the same class?
questions.client_notes: Ensure price ranges reflect current market conditions. Consider currency localization for international surveys.

script.question_text: What is your maximum acceptable price premium for a hybrid version compared to a conventional gasoline vehicle in the same class?

questions.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have about owning a hybrid vehicle?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights. Limit response to 250 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text with character limit

script.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have about owning a hybrid vehicle?

questions.question_text: How important is the availability of fast-charging infrastructure for your hybrid vehicle purchasing decision?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Display scale endpoints clearly.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice radio buttons with Likert scale

script.question_text: How important is the availability of fast-charging infrastructure for your hybrid vehicle purchasing decision?
